# 6.0 Docs

## Windows Forms

- [APIs throw ArgumentNullException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/apis-throw-argumentnullexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where some APIs validate arguments and now throw an ArgumentNullException.
- [C# templates use application bootstrap](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/application-bootstrap.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where C# templates for Windows Forms apps include application bootstrap code.
- [DataGridView APIs throw InvalidOperationException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/null-owner-causes-invalidoperationexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where some APIs related to DataGridView throw an exception if the object's DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Owner value is null.
- [ListViewGroupCollection methods throw new InvalidOperationException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/listview-invalidoperationexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where some ListViewGroupCollection methods throw a new InvalidOperationException if the ListView is in virtual mode.
- [NotifyIcon.Text maximum text length increased](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/notifyicon-text-max-text-length-increased.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where some the maximum text length for the NotifyIcon.Text property increased.
- [ScaleControl called only when needed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/optimize-scalecontrol-calls.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 for Windows Forms where ScaleControl is only called if scaling is needed.
- [TableLayoutSettings properties throw InvalidEnumArgumentException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/tablelayoutsettings-apis-throw-invalidenumargumentexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where some TableLayoutSettings APIs now throw an InvalidEnumArgumentException for invalid arguments.
- [TreeNodeCollection.Item throws exception if node is assigned elsewhere](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/6.0/treenodecollection-item-throws-argumentexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where TreeNodeCollection.Item(Int32) now throws an ArgumentException if the node being assigned is already assigned to a TreeView.
